ai_operations.reasoning: To reach an increased but controlled granularity (target ~20 total clusters), we split the largest, multi-phase threads where clear sub-topics and phase transitions exist: FitFusion trademark/taglines (cluster_007), Q3 content calendar (cluster_008), TechNova budget (cluster_009), GreenScape extension coordination (cluster_010), and FitFusion brand guidelines (cluster_012). Each split aligns with project phases and deliverable-specific discussions. Other clusters were left intact to avoid exceeding the 15–20 target and because they were already focused on a single phase or deliverable.
